settings.heading: The wizard's
settings.description:
Magic was first cast over the business idea Trylledice when the worldwide corona epidemic spread around the world. At first sight we were in love with the DnD world. It's a perfect combination between being together as brothers and having fun with our friends at the same time

We felt down to a YouTube wormhole of How to create handmade diceset. After two years of working on an absolutely perfect spell we are now creating unique handmade dice set.

Alex is wizard behind all visual graphic. That includes the logo, animations and other illustrations you see on Trylledices instagram or here on the website.

Alexs specialty is polishing dice. Beside that, believe it or not, he plays a cool guitar solo.

settings.fact-list: My specialty is polishing dice. I play a cool guitar solo. I love making visual graphics

settings.description:
Zac is the wizard behind Trylledices instagram on a day to day basis. He is the one who comes up with new ideas of what to post, see what is trending and answer people in DM.

Zacs favorite thing when making dice is the proces behind and the techniques they use.

settings.about-alex-dice: Alex loves the Pink Pods diceset. It reminds him of his parents garden with the flowers inside. Beside that he loves the gold digit color and is his favorit. Alex plays as a chaotic evil warlock, Ba'alzebub. His quest is to sieze the light and let the darknness consume the world. That's why the Red Coils In The Dark dice are first choice for Alex
settings.about-zac-dice: Zac really likes the Red Coils in the Dark. He think it is the craziest diceset they have made so far and he loves the details in it.

settings.generator-title: See which unique dice is your favorite
settings.generator-desc: Try your luck and generate a dice. Maybe you will feel inspired by the dice that pops up on your screen.
